general.educational: This information is for educational purposes only and should not be considered medical advice.
general.consultation: Always consult with qualified healthcare professionals for medical concerns.
general.emergency: If you're experiencing a medical emergency, contact emergency services immediately.

nutrition.general: Nutritional advice provided is general in nature and may not be suitable for everyone.
nutrition.medical: If you have specific dietary requirements or medical conditions, consult a registered dietitian.
nutrition.allergies: Always check for food allergies and consult healthcare providers about dietary restrictions.

fitness.general: Exercise recommendations are general guidelines and may not be suitable for everyone.
fitness.safety: Consult a healthcare provider before starting any new exercise program.
fitness.injury: Stop exercise and seek medical attention if you experience pain or discomfort.

mental_health.general: Mental health information provided is for general awareness only.
mental_health.crisis: If you're experiencing a mental health crisis, contact mental health emergency services.
mental_health.treatment: For mental health treatment, consult licensed mental health professionals.

sleep.general: Sleep recommendations are general guidelines and may not address specific sleep disorders.
sleep.medical: If you have persistent sleep problems, consult a sleep specialist or healthcare provider.

medication.general: Never start, stop, or modify medication without consulting your healthcare provider.
medication.interaction: Always discuss potential medication interactions with your healthcare provider.

special_populations.pregnancy: If you are pregnant or nursing, consult your healthcare provider before making any health changes.
special_populations.chronic_conditions: If you have chronic health conditions, work with your healthcare team for personalized advice.
special_populations.children: For children's health concerns, always consult with pediatric healthcare providers.
special_populations.elderly: Older adults should consult healthcare providers for age-appropriate health recommendations.
